tags: None
review:
Hi ladies, 
I have severe PCOS & I still got Pregnant Naturally.

I‚Äôm very happy to post a positive review for Dr. Disha Sridhar who helped me to conceive naturally despite all my problems.

I was hopelessly walking in tears & pain after a miscarriage, then D&C and suffering from worsened PCOS (irregular periods & severe bleeding problem), cysts, fibroids in uterus & fibrodema for last 10yrs‚Ä¶and from there to normal pregnancy, isn‚Äôt that miraculous!

Getting pregnant! Ah, that was a farfetched or next to impossible dream; I just anyhow wanted to have normal regular periods at that time.

I had enough of birth control pills, its side effects and medication that just pumped hormones.

After trying our luck through even ayurvedic medicine which did not yield much result; we met Dr. Disha Sridhar at Motherhood Hospital, Indiranagar, Bangalore; a very practical doctor & an integrative practitioner who believes in treating problems from its root cause through holistic healing. Her main aim is to treat patients with hormonal imbalances naturally.

She was the only doctor who gave positive nod about solving my problems from its core, talked about dissolving my cysts and recovery through natural, non invasive options, no synthetic hormonal pills & balancing my hormones naturally.  I initially thought this was not possible and was sceptical about her way of treatment, wanted to stick to ayurvedic, the proven method, but something within me urged to go forward and with my husband‚Äôs unconditional support, I tried it out.  I trusted her and the results are out.

Gradually, my periods started to come back every month without any modern medicines. I started to revive and cherish my feminine energy thus cultivating better positive relationship with my body. I've learned to make my body something I work with as opposed to work against which helped me achieve an ideal sense of health.

Thus, I conceived naturally within four months of embracing healing techniques formulated by Dr. Disha.

With a healthy body, I‚Äôm enjoying full problem-free, easy, effortless, nurturing pregnancy ‚Äî no aches, pains or other issues, creating a smooth transition into my new state of being. 

All thanks to Dr. Disha Sridhar with whom I‚Äôm receiving good antenatal care at Motherhood.  With her, it‚Äôs like she shares equal responsibility for my maternity care, right from nutrition, supplements to lifestyle changes. She is the one with whom we can freely talk to about our hopes and fears.

With this I would invite you to think differently about PCOS. I healed my body by balancing my hormones and through the opportunity to become a mother; my body has healed my spirit. I wish & believe the same is possible for you too.
-Shreya Nambiar,
Bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
TRUHEALING PROGRAMME - A MAGICAL MANTRA!!
 
Life is a mirror!! You would receive, what you give. Be it the bad or the best!!
‚ÄúTruhealing‚Äù is a program, which helped to give the best, add the essence of positivity to life and have a healthy smile on my face always.
In 2012, when I was reported with hypo thyroid ‚Äì I had no clue that my life would turn miserable with chains of allergies. By nature, I am a very foody person and I just love to travel and explore new places. I always wish to taste the special food of the place that I visit.
It so happened that in 2013 when I had such trip, I developed the first allergy within no time (after I had a food in one of the very good restaurant) suddenly rushed to the doctor and took medicine. To my surprise, even the medicine turned allergic to me. Then I started to hunt for a good treatment to overcome this allergy. Initially all the doctors noted this to be the food allergy. I underwent a food allergy test too. Nothing worked!!! As all the tests resulted as normal.
Meanwhile the hypothyroid treatment went up from 25 mg to 50 mg to 75 mg tablets. In other words, my thyroid was not functioning well.
Things turned even messier when there was change in my personal life. After marriage, every single day was indeed a happy day but with unhealthy body. Allergy was the major concern.
These course of health issues started disturbing my professional life too. I was unable to put my 100% at my work place. Confidence level started dropping, when I had recurred typhoid, drug allergies. I was just missing my social life as I was unable to attend any of the function/party due to the health conditions (both physical and mental).
Then the research, on good treatment started. Finally I ended up meeting Dr. Disha at motherhood hospital. To be honest when I met her for the first time, I had no clue what treatment she was speaking about. It was something new (which I had never heard or tried ever before).
Today I thank Dr. Disha for all the best things she added in to my life. The ‚ÄúTruhealing‚Äù treatment is not only the treatment for body, but I can confidently say- it is actually a great treatment for your body, - mind and soul. Things what I eat, how I eat; Thoughts- what I think and Action- how I express‚Ä¶ oh! God!! Never ever thought before, all these influence the health of mind, which in turn affects the body.
The great thing I learnt from this program are :
1) What to eat
2) What not to eat
3) How to eat
4) When to eat
5) What to think
6) How to express
7) How to keep myself calm and in peace
8) How to pray
9) How to treat others
10) How to trust myself
11) How to keep myself strong
12) How to be happy in life
13) What things to pick up for life ( Positive or Negative)
One of the best thing of this program, which I feel is really awesome is ‚Äì People around you will definitely identify the change in you and will start appreciating you for you turned to.
I feel, there are many more ladies like me round the world- who wanted to overcome many other health issues. I just wish and pray, all such ladies are benefited by this program, lead and stay happy and strong life like meJ
 
WISH EACH ONE A GREAT, HAPPY, STRONG AND HEALTHY LIFE J

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I went to Dr. Disha for my PCOD issue & paid 800/- Rs fees & with expectations that doctor will give me some solution to my problem. After my first visit, she asked me to get some tests done.

Once my tests were done, I went back to Dr. to show & to my surprise doctor instead of telling me what I should do, she told me join her truhealing program for 6 months ***** *** *** ****** ***

Doctor also scared me by saying my liver is 60% damaged & my body is my mess & I should subscribe to her 6 months diet plan immediately. She also justified "the cost by saying per day cost is less than what she pays to her maid".

When I went to another doctor to take a second opinion she said there is nothing abnormal * **** ** * ********* ******** * ***** ** ******* **** ** ***** ** ******** It is normal to have liver enzymes & sugar levels going up in PCOD.*** **** ** ********** **** ** *** *** ** ***** ** *** ****** ***** * ****** *** ** **** ***** **** *** ***** *** **** ** **** ******* * ****** *** only thing she kept saying was I cannot tell you right now, subscribe to my truhealing package.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre Menstrual Syndrome,PCOD,Premenstrual swelling in breasts,Premenstrual Tenderness in Breasts,
review: Hi visited Dr. Disha for my few observation i had about my periods. in first session she explained me about PCOD and its variants. she suggested me few tests which i felt were really helpful.  when i went to her for second consultation, after seeing my reports she told me the problem is really bad and it could be solved after taking her truhealing programme. i told her as a student it will be little difficult for me to join but she kept emphizing that joining her programme will be very benificial. i dont doubt her programme but i told her as a student my stance. she suggested me  ashwagangda and evion tablets for my problems. * **** *** *** *** ***** *** ** ****** so still i am not sure what should i do regarding my problems if i am not joining her programmes. *** *** * ******* ** ** ****** **** ******* ***** ********** ******* **** *** ** *** **** **** ********** ********  **********  *** *** * ******* *** *** ***** ***** ****** **** ******* ************* after leaving hospital i felt very bad as i was not satisfied with her approch.  ***** ** **** ********* ******** ** *******  ** *** ***** ** ****** **** *********

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
Dr Disha is truly an exceptional doctor. I haven't come across such a thorough doctor who knows the body so well. That's the key. I had skin issues, PCOD, infertility problems. Dr Disha went through our history & the case patiently, asked many queries and then explained the problem in detail. She also suggested the plan to address all these issues. She doesn't only cure the problems that you visit her for but also heal the overall body. She believes in healing the body through organic food habits. She also helps you stay calm with keeping things very simple.
We have met so many doctors for infertility but only Disha was able to address it to the core. Thanks Disha.
She is thoroughly professional and very very friendly.
I got so much self confidence by just interacting with her over the course of last 1.5 years. She is a rare doctor.
I highly recommend Dr Disha for any gynaec issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted with Dr. Disha while planning my pregnancy. I found her empathetic, compassionate, and forthright. When my blood results were inconclusive,vshe warned me to look out for certain signs. The ultrasound didn't catch it but it ended up being an ectopic pregnancy. I went in with a fallopian tube rupture and massive blood loss. She was not on duty but she rushed back and performed a difficult surgery.
 She is competent in treating hormonal issues and suggesting the right treatment protocols. We have got twins and  I am very happy to recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** **** ********** *** ********* ** *** ******* *** treatment is inimitable. Her focus is on the root cause of the disease not just the symptoms. She is very friendly and sensitive towards her patient. I went to her for simple ovarian cyst. She explained me everything related to it in detail and made sure that I'm comfortable. I had undergone laproscopic cystectomy under her guidance and i feel this was the best decision. She is very reliable and even her staff is very friendly and caring. I would suggest her for all the gynae related problems. Her way of treating patients is different and better than others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I had a very great experience with Dr Disha sridhar, she is a wonderful , friendly and extremly talented. after 3 yrs of my marriage, i got pregnant but  unfortunately der was no heartbeat bec of which I undergone D& C, that was the time i met Dr Disha, she guided me so well with her gud medicines, again after 4 months i conceived and she helped me  throughout  the pregnancy, the journey was beautiful and with her gud efforts i delivered normal boy baby, the best part of her is she wil encourage u for normal delivery. me and my husband are always thankful to herüòä.                    Aparna singh

Under her guidance and treatment we were blessed with our little bundle of joy. Would highly recommend to approach Doctor Disha for any gynac issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Disha is the most compassionate, patient gynecologist I‚Äôve met and I‚Äôve met many- most don‚Äôt care about your issues unless it‚Äôs pregnancy-related. She‚Äôs also the only doctor I‚Äôve met who is determined to get to and treat the root cause of the problem instead of blindly treating symptoms. I haven‚Äôt started treatment yet, but from my first consultation with her, it looks promising. After ages of suffering I have hope that my pcos issues can be resolved once and for all.

tags: None
review:
Hie in your pcos blog u have mentioned how medicine has its own side effects 
So what do people do in this case don't eat medicine and let the pcos be the way it is
If a person has normal weight and no diabetes n still has pcos what do the person do with the problem
reply_text: You got it right. There is no magic bullet for treating  PCOS. But the good news is that it can be completely  reversed with a holistic  and systemic approach.  At Truhealing, we treat the root cause of your PCOS or any other hormone imbalance  by addressing  the  root cause of your issue using whole food nutrition,  energy medicine and regenerative detoxification.
